definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: jing1 shen2 xing4 yan4 shi2 zheng4

sentences.english: Multiple studies have shown a relationship between spirituality and the immune system.
sentences.chinese: 多項研究已表明在精神性和免疫系統之間的關係。

sentences.english: He worries about his spirituality and then skewers his fellow campers.
sentences.chinese: 他擔心自己的精神性，然後又譏諷他的營友。

sentences.english: This case your child may also be the spirit of frequent urination .
sentences.chinese: 您孩子這種情況也可能是精神性尿頻。

sentences.english: The spiritual path becomes religion from that point of view, pejoratively speaking.
sentences.chinese: 於是退化地，精神性的道路從此觀點就變成了宗教。

sentences.english: Seeking after spirit is the impulsion of development of art.
sentences.chinese: 對精神性的追求是藝術發展的原動力和支撐點。

definition: inner transcendence (perfection through one's own inner moral cultivation, as in Confucianism, for example)
